org.jclouds.openstack.cinder.v1
Interface CinderAsyncApi

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
Deprecated. please use org.jclouds.ContextBuilder#buildApi(CinderApi.class) as CinderAsyncApi interface will be removed in jclouds 1.7. 

@Deprecated
public interface CinderAsyncApi
extends Closeable

Provides asynchronous access to Cinder via its REST API.

Author:
Everett Toews
